Browse the source code of netbsd/external/bsd/ntp/dist/libntp/uglydate.c

1/* $NetBSD: uglydate.c,v 1.4 2016/01/08 21:35:39 christos Exp $ */
2
3/*
4 * uglydate - convert a time stamp to something barely readable
5 * The string returned is 37 characters long.
6 */
7#include <config.h>
8#include <stdio.h>
9
10#include "ntp_fp.h"
11#include "ntp_unixtime.h"
12#include "lib_strbuf.h"
13#include "ntp_stdlib.h"
14
15
16char *
17uglydate(
18 l_fp *ts
19 )
20{
21 char *bp;
22 char *timep;
23 struct tm *tm;
24 time_t sec;
25 long msec;
26 int year;
27
28 timep = ulfptoa(ts, 6); /* returns max 17 characters */
29 LIB_GETBUF(bp);
30 sec = ts->l_ui - JAN_1970;
31 msec = ts->l_uf / 4294967; /* fract / (2**32/1000) */
32 tm = gmtime(&sec);
33 if (ts->l_ui == 0) {
34 /*
35 * Probably not a real good thing to do. Oh, well.
36 */
37 year = 0;
38 tm->tm_yday = 0;
39 tm->tm_hour = 0;
40 tm->tm_min = 0;
41 tm->tm_sec = 0;
42 } else {
43 year = tm->tm_year;
44 while (year >= 100)
45 year -= 100;
46 }
47 snprintf(bp, LIB_BUFLENGTH,
48 "%17s %02d:%03d:%02d:%02d:%02d.%03ld", timep, year,
49 tm->tm_yday, tm->tm_hour, tm->tm_min, tm->tm_sec,
50 msec);
51
52 return bp;
53}
54
